name: Pyramid Energy
text:
You can select and activate 1 of the following effects:
â—? Increase the ATK of all face-up monsters on your side of the field by 200 points until the End Phase of the turn this card is activated.
â—? Increase the DEF of all face-up monsters on your side of the field by 500 points until the End Phase of the turn this card is activated.
